txt.en: You have found a sample of Virulent Spores
You have found a sample of Noxious Spores
You have found a sample of Infectious Spores
These spores emit a faint, barely perceptible odour.
A foul reek emanates so strongly from the noxious spores that you could smell them long before you saw them.
Collect samples of the blight that is corrupting the Sixteenth Hall
You have found a sample of Pestilent Spores
The infectious spores must be handled with the utmost care.
Pestilent spores are especially dangerous, filling your lungs with searing pain if you dare to inhale too deeply.
Collect samples of the blight that is corrupting the Sixteenth Hall.
